definition: Qi of the Northern Dynasties (550-557)
north/(classical) to be defeated
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
History of Qi of the Northern Dynasties, eleventh of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled by Li Baiyao 李百藥|李百药[Li3 Bai3 yao4] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 50 scrolls

sentences.english: They are the biggest cave legacy remained from Northern Qi Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 是中国北齐时期遗留下来的最大的石窟遗存。

sentences.english: Bingsheng Guan is a special type of official in Beiqi.
sentences.chinese: 并省官是北齐一种比较独特的官职。

sentences.english: Northern Qi collapsed first, and next was attacked by northern Chou and Chen, then it came down at last.
sentences.chinese: 北齐自身衰落，再加北周与陈的合攻，才终致灭亡。
